org.activebpel.rt.attachment
Class AeAttachmentContainer

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection
      java.util.AbstractList
          java.util.ArrayList
              org.activebpel.rt.attachment.AeAttachmentContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Collection, IAeAttachmentContainer, java.util.List, java.util.RandomAccess, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeVariable.AeVariableAttachmentContainer
public class AeAttachmentContainer
extends java.util.ArrayList
implements IAeAttachmentContainer

Container for internal attachments associated with AeVariable or AeMessageData. Attachments are instances of IAeAttachmentItem.

See Also:
Serialized Form
